question: A visual technique designed to show how the average target market consumer perceives the positioning of competing products in the market place is known as ________.

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: That’s not correct. Differentiation positioning is based on the differentiating characteristics or qualities that make your product/service/brand better than those of your competitors.
That’s not correct. Head-to-head positioning involves directly competing on similar product attributes in the market.
That’s not correct. A positioning statement is a brief description of your offering, how it meets the needs of a consumer, and why it is superior to your competitor’s offerings.
A perceptual map is a visual diagram that shows how the average target market consumer perceives your product versus those of your competitors.

detailedSolution: A perceptual map is a visual diagram that shows how the average target market consumer perceives your product versus those of your competitors.
